# Data

Yield is in kg per ha

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)

read.csv(
  "data_nrate-all.csv"
) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  rename(yield.cum = cumulative.grain.yield,
         yield = yield.kgperha
         ) %>% 
  mutate(stand.age = ordered(stand.age)) %>% 
  mutate(
    across(
      c(block,location, id),
      factor
    )
  ) %>% 
  glimpse()

```
